name: Be Not Afraid (TEAMK340)
description:
You are trapped by angels. Befriend them to learn their weaknesses. To kill them.

A short action platformer where you play as an unnamed being who must defeat other angels in order to escape the monotony of limbo. 

A game by Elijah Budd, Kenny Park, Derek Hansen, Philip Reid, Connor Wilson, Josh Jones, Forrest Dills, and Peter Sanders.
